Package com.dromedarydrones.mainapp

Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
com.dromedarydrones.mainapp.Configuration
All Implemented Interfaces:
XmlSerializable
public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
implements XmlSerializable
Master configuration class to track of each separate saved simulation state/configuration. Controls saving and loading configuration save data and swapping between saved simulations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String LOCATIONS_PATH
    location of the file that tracks the location of the last used safe file

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.io.File file)
      Loads the simulation config from the specified file if possible. Otherwise uses the default configuration.
      Parameters:
      file - XML save file containing the configuration

    • getCurrentSimulation

      public Simulation getCurrentSimulation()
      returns the simulation configuration currently loaded.

    • getConfigurationFromFile

      public static Simulation getConfigurationFromFile​(java.io.File file)
      Builds a simulation instance from the contents of an XML file.
      Parameters:
      file - save file to retrieve the configuration from
      Returns:
      new instance of the configuration or null

    • getDefaultConfiguration

      public static Simulation getDefaultConfiguration()
      Returns the default simulation configuration of Grove City College

    • getLastConfigurationFile

      public java.io.File getLastConfigurationFile()
      Returns the File object of the last used configuration.

      Throws:

    • saveResults

      Saves the simulation results to a CSV file.
      Parameters:

      file - file to save the results to

    • saveConfigurations

      public void saveConfigurations​(java.io.File saveFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves all simulation states to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      saveFile - save file to save the data to
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the save file did not exist
      java.io.IOException
